summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.2°C) and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3150 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1775 m), light levels (up 8770 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 191.6m lower than yesterday, 679.9m lower than the past week, 1775.4m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 875.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Heavy and prolonged rainfall is likely, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and bright intervals likely. Changeable conditions.
